Prerequisite: Improved Saber Throw

As a part of the action used to cast this power, you must make a ranged force attack with a lightweapon or vibroweapon against one target within the power's range, otherwise the power fails. On a hit, the target takes [[/r 6d8]] damage of the same type as the weapon's damage and must make a Constitution saving throw against an additional effect depending on your choice of casting ability:

Wisdom. The target takes an additional [[/r 4d6]] force damage and it gains four levels of slowed until the end of its next turn. On a success, the target takes half as much damage and its speed isn't reduced.

Charisma. The target takes an additional [[/r 4d6]] necrotic damage and cannot regain hit points until the end of its next turn. On a success, the target takes half as much damage and its healing capability is unaffected.

The weapon then immediately returns to your hand.

Force Potency. When you cast this power using a force slot of 6th level or higher, the force or necrotic damage increases by [[/r 1d6]] for each slot above 5th.
